attributes.title: horrible ❤️
attributes.review:
i just got it to download after a few years. i was enjoying having a homophobic, racist, rapist, sexist, orange president when he was elected, so i decided to download it when he became the president. but the app finally downloaded after 4 years and i went on and slender man told me i looked pretty. it was sad because me and him have a rough past 💔👴🏻 it brought a lot up that i didn’t want to remember. the times we stayed in bed all day, the times we stayed up till 3am just reading our diary’s together. it was just hard to look back because i loved him so much. anyway it was just slender man saying i looked pretty and that i should vote for trump. so manipulative!! i’m so mad 👨‍🦲
 

s

attributes.title: Trump 2020 is over
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it took forever to get it open I hate this app don’t download it I think it deserves 1 one star it’s honestly a bad app he is making The US a bad place so if u like him y’all are messed up but that’s ur opinion if u do like him. Trump 2020 is over and also he is Deleting TikTok for no reason everyone loves that app but why is he deleting it for no reason such a bad president thank for ur time

attributes.title: Terrifying app
attributes.review: After the literal 2 weeks this app took to download I felt a weird sense like I was being watched so I had my friend look through my phone and this app and she said that there is a high chance that the government and trump administration has access to everything on my phone and can see me through my camera! This app scares me because it is revoking my right to privacy! I am disgusted 🤢🤮

attributes.title: Tried it. It’s terrible. Don’t give them your info. You’ll get spammed.
attributes.review: So, why, if you’re the POTUS would you pay for this kind of low-budget garbage? I tried it, I hated it, but that wasn’t worth the 1-star alone. The app keeps crashing, and now that I gave them my info, I’m getting contacted by a bunch of different republican candidates that I didn’t give my information to. I didn’t agree to that, and I’m furious.

attributes.title: TeRrIbLe🧚🏼‍♂️✨
attributes.review: Well this app promised me to get BTS concert tickets and all i got was an orange man speaking about how hell make America great again🥴 anyways i started reading more and more and i started to feel powerful like i had the right to objectify women and be racist to black people ✨🧚🏼‍♂️ finding a solution i yeeted my phone across America hoping to would go knock some sense into out orange president but it sadly didnt☹️ anyways terrible app it belongs to the highway😌🧚🏼‍♂️✨

attributes.title: Worst App (Do Not Recommend)
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what our amazing president had planned for the campaign. When I downloaded it, I was attacked through the screen by a giant Oompa Loompa. I could not even catch a break before being attacked on twitter by the creator himself. If you want an app that attacks its users and notifies your phone a million times a day with an awful jingle then this is it, would not recommend at all!

attributes.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: this app has made my entire phone completely crash. i was so excited at first to get this app but it was a completely mistake!! i had to reset my entire phone i lost all of contacts and a bunch of photos. if i knew purchasing this app would’ve done this i would’ve NEVER gotten it. this apps needs to me taken down immediately this is absolutely ridiculous.

attributes.title: TikTok 2020 😌
attributes.review: This app is AWFUL as soon as I opened it, it send me dares like to kill myself and to do other horrible stuff. this is out of hand I almost died just from downloading this app. As soon as I opened it I saw a bright orange color I thought I was seeing Jesus then I realized it was trump then I was like oh nvm. Anyways I would not recommend this app it took like 78 weeks to download and when I finally installed this is what I get 🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Works great
attributes.review: Downloaded super fast and seems to be working great for me. All the negative reviews are those who either just don’t like the President and/or are trying to get the app removed.

attributes.title: Not a viable platform
attributes.review: As a student and a voter. I can’t use this ap for what I need. As the TikTok app is about to leave the App Store I started to look for new apps to spend my time on. I found this app to not help. I would like to say that the app falsely promotes information that is not true. I do not appreciate the language used in this app. I find it offensive to my personal beliefs. I understand the need for a new app to fill the void but it is no bueno
